alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 27 at 2:27AM PDT until November 01 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. Strongest winds will be on the foothills of the mountains. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
